profile.bio: Infra Engineer，pepabo，Ph.D. student，Kyoto Univ，OS，Middleware，Trusterd，mod_mruby，ngx_mruby，The 9th Japanese OSS Encouragement Award Winner，IPSJ Yamashita SIG Research Award，RubyPrize Final Nominee，Fukuoka Ruby Award Outstanding Performance Awards
